response.explain: Since this is the first step, there is no previous action or error to explain. The task is to cook a clove of garlic and place it on a plate with butter. The garlic and butter are both inside the fridge, which is currently closed. The first step is to open the fridge to access these ingredients.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the garlic clove
(3) Cook the garlic clove
(4) Take out the butter
(5) Place the cooked garlic clove and butter on the plate
response.code:
